column5: Went out again today, and thought it was going to be the same as yesturday with only catching tiny smolts, and it was for the beggining..    Till this fish decided to take down my float.. What a fight after catching tiny fish all day     Then after a few more smolts got this really nice one, what a crazy fight took about 20 minutes to get her in alone,     The Release Shot    Now i gotta get a bigger net..
Great report and pics! Do you ever keep any for the pan?  BTW... Great Photoshopping, those rocks and riverbank look so natural!!!
Beauty fish man... ya gotta love steelheading!!!!
I dont keep any wild steelies, only a few small stocked ones per year.
GCD HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAH!!! definetly the quote for 2007!!!   LOL  Gerritt.
nice report & pics,way to go... no you are addicted for sure go get em......
NICELY DONE BRO!!! SOME PRETTY DARK LOOKIN FISH THERE!! EARLY SPAWN FOR SURE THIS YR!!
Nice steelhead. W2G When do the smolts drop back out of the stream? because i had a couple attacks my spawn sac as i was reeling in my line when i was fishing a creek.   jordan
Beauty, Im liking these reportsm gives me a little moreconfidence for tomorrow ive been skunked for a while
